repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The Tirukkuṟaḷ, text with the commentary by Parimēlaḻakar.
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page. No foliation. Verso blank.
3 folios = Tirukkuṟaḷ: Table of Contents. Tamil foliation {1}, 2-3 and parallel Arabic foliation {1}, 2-3.
375 folios = Tirukkuṟaḷ: Text & Commentary. Tamil foliation 1-375. Parallel Arabic foliation 1-375. f375v blank.
2 folios = back guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc:
Note in black ink on a deatched paper sheet, by Velanguani Arokium (?):
Mr Ducler N° 11
intitulé Courale, (la voix) ou morales & maximes, en vers
par Tirouvallouvare, poète d'antiquité
et explication faite par Parimêlajagare, aussi poète
ancien,
Contenant 375 feuilles,
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 51 (front cover, recto).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to approximately 1830 by Vinson (1868) and to 1830 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). By Ducler's scribe, working around 1830.

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 84.

provenance.p: Copied for Philippe Ducler by an unnamed copyist in Karaikal Jail. See Burnouf (1832).

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique. Journal asiatique 10, p. 84-87. — See p. 90, n° 28.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 11, no. 51.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 17r, no. 51.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49). — See p. 17, no. 51.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Record created by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, July 2022.
Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.

ab.seg:
Courale dit par Tirouvallouware
avec
Explication faite par Parimêlajagare.
